Location: 29.0掳N 93.2掳W
Moving: NNW at 15 mph
Min pressure: 939 mb
Max sustained: 150 mph

75 miles from Port Arthur, TX and Lake Charles, LA

Storm surge in Vermilion Bay region has the potential to be in the 10 to 15 ft range still.

According to the Jefferson County Sheriff's Office, deputies responded to a 911 call at 3:38pm this afternoon, in reference to an accidental shooting in the 19000 block of Burrell-Wingate in Fannett.
"A 15 year old male advised that he had been out near a pond on family property when a dog jumped up onto his ATV knocking over his 22 rifle causing it to discharge. The bullet struck the teen causing a non-life threatening injury. The teen was able to use his cell phone to call for assistance.
He was transported to a local hospital where he is listed in stable condition."

A shooting North of Spurger has led officers to the Buna/Evadale area in search of a suspect. Evadale ISD is on precautionary lockdown, and officers have been spotted searching via ground and air for said suspect. A description and further details are not available at this time, as officers are occupied with the man hunt.
There will be an increased police presence at Buna Elementary and Junior High during pickup today, but law enforcement has indicated that the suspect is not near Buna ISD. Dr. Lee says that the school is not on complete lockdown, but all exterior doors remain locked and extra precautions have been taken. The students are safe at this time.
